DOC.brief_summary: The purpose clinical trial compare longevity two dialysis catheter .
DOC.detailed_description: This study multi-center , randomize , prospective , open-label , clinical study compare conventional split-tip catheter symmetric tip catheter subject undergoing hemodialysis .
DOC.criteria: Subject must 18 year age old . Subject must meet labeled indication hemodialysis . Subject must End Stage Renal Disease ( ESRD ) . Subject must patent right leave internal jugular vein . Subject treatment plan must require chronic hemodialysis treatment 3 time per week minimum 6 week . Subject must give write informed consent . Subjects concurrently enrol Randomized Clinical Trial ( RCT ) may enroll RCT course study , subject previously randomize clinical study . Subjects active infection time study enrollment . Subjects know sensitivity heparin , previous incidence heparininduced thrombocytopenia . Subjects uncontrolled abnormal coagulation parameter additional risk clot excessive bleeding . Subjects know suspected pregnant time study enrollment plan get pregnant study period . Subjects perform dialysis flow rate 450 mL/min would contraindicate reason . Subject unable unwilling commit followup visit study procedure throughout course study . Subjects , opinion Investigators , appropriate candidate study base upon current past medical history , negative past experience either study catheter .
